00045     100 => 'Continue',

00049     202 => 'Accepted',

00051     204 => 'No Content',
00052     205 => 'Reset Content',
00053     206 => 'Partial Content',
00054     300 => 'Multiple Choices',
00055     301 => 'Moved Permanently',
00056     302 => 'Found',
00057     303 => 'See Other',
00058     304 => 'Not Modified',
00059     305 => 'Use Proxy',
00060     306 => '(Unused)',
00061     307 => 'Temporary Redirect',
00062     400 => 'Bad Request',
00063     401 => 'Unauthorized',
00064     402 => 'Payment Required',

00094   protected $headers = array();
00095   
00101   protected $status  = null;
00102   
00108   protected $content = null;
00109   
00110   
00117   public function __construct()
00118   {
00119     $this->status = 200;
00120     $this->addCustomHeader('Content-Type', 'text/html; charset=UTF-8', true);
00121   }
00122   
00123   
00132   public function setContent($content, $is_file = false)
00133   {
00134     if ($is_file === true) {
00135       if (file_exists($content) === false) {
00136         throw new Exception('File doesn\'t exist');
00137       }
00138       
00139       $content = file_get_contents($content);
00140       if ($content === false) {
00141         throw new Exception('Impossible to use file to complete content');
00142       }
00143     }
00144     
00145     $this->content = $content;
00146   }
00147   
00148   
00155   public function send()
00156   {
00157     $this->sendHeader();
00158     echo $this->content;
00159     exit;
00160   }
00161   
00162   
00169   public function sendHeaderOnly()
00170   {
00171     $this->sendHeader();
00172     exit;
00173   }
00174   
00175   
00185   public function addCustomHeader($name, $value, $replace = false)
00186   {
00187     if ($replace === false) {
00188       if (isset($this->headers[$name]) === true) {
00189         return;
00190       }
00191     }
00192     
00193     $this->headers[$name] = $value;
00194   }
00195   
00196   
00204   public function setDownloadHeader($filename)
00205   {
00206     $this->addCustomHeader('Content-Type', 'application/force-download', true);
00207     $this->addCustomHeader('Content-disposition', 'attachment; filename="'.str_replace('"', "'", $filename).'"', true);
00208     $this->addCustomHeader('Content-Transfer-Encoding', 'application/octet-stream', true);
00209     $this->addCustomHeader('Content-Length', mb_strlen($this->content), true);
00210     $this->addCustomHeader('Pragma', 'no-cache', true);
00211     $this->addCustomHeader('Cache-Control', 'must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0, public', true);
00212     $this->addCustomHeader('Expires', '0', true);
00213   }
00214   
00215   
00222   private function sendHeader()
00223   {
00224     // Construction du statut
00225     if (isset(Response::$status_text[$this->status]) === false) {
00226       throw new Exception('undefined status code');
00227     }
00228     header('HTTP/1.0 '.$this->status.' '.Response::$status_text[$this->status]);
00229     
00230     foreach ($this->headers as $name => $value) {
00231       header($name.': '.$value, true);
00232     }
00233   }
00234 }
